name: better-aliases
title: Better Aliases
description: Better Aliases - Create better aliases in Raycast
author: alexi.build

commands.name: create-alias
commands.title: Create Alias
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Create a new alias for URLs, apps, commands, or text snippets

commands.name: search-aliases
commands.title: Search Aliases
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Search, view, edit, and delete aliases

commands.name: open-config-folder
commands.title: Open Config Folder
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Open the folder containing your Better Aliases configuration files in Finder

commands.name: view-usage-stats
commands.title: View Alias Usage Statistics
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: View usage counts for all aliases

commands.name: view-cheatsheet
commands.title: View Keyboard Layout or Cheatsheet
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Visualize aliases in Tree View or Keyboard Layout

commands.name: insert-snippet
commands.title: Insert Snippet
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Search and insert any alias value as text

commands.name: export-snippets
commands.title: Export Better Aliases as Raycast Snippets
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Export Better Aliases as Raycast Snippets in JSON format

commands.name: export-quicklinks
commands.title: Export Better Aliases as Raycast Quicklinks
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Export Better Aliases as Raycast Quicklinks in JSON format

commands.name: import-leader-key
commands.title: Import from Leader Key Config
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Import your Leader Key configuration into Better Aliases

commands.name: export-leader-key
commands.title: Export to Leader Key Config
commands.subtitle: Better Aliases
commands.description: Export your Better Aliases configuration to Leader Key format

preferences.name: hideAccessories
preferences.title: Display Options
preferences.description: Configure how list items are displayed
preferences.label: Show less data in list view

preferences.name: snippetPrefix
preferences.title: Snippet Prefix
preferences.description: Single character prefix to trigger snippet mode (text insertion instead of opening)

preferences.name: randomizedSnippetSeparator
preferences.title: Randomized Snippet Separator
preferences.description: Character or string to separate snippet values for random selection (e.g., ';;' to separate 'Hello there!;;Good morning!;;How are you today?')

preferences.name: betterAliasesConfigPath
preferences.title: Better Aliases Config Path (optional)
preferences.description: Override default config location. Leave empty to use Raycast's extension support folder.

preferences.name: leaderKeyConfigPath
preferences.title: Leader Key Config Path (optional)
preferences.description: Path to the leader key configuration file (defaults to ~/Library/Application Support/Leader Key/config.json)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
